input_args.text:
'VIDEO : Unhinged Failing Fox Anchor Megyn Kelly Attacks Mike Pence VIDEO : Unhinged Failing Fox Anchor Megyn Kelly Attacks Mike Pence Videos By Amy Moreno October 27, 2016 
Megyn Kelly has completely lost it. 
Her show has morphed into a wild circus act, where Kelly screeches and claws at her guests like a crazy menopausal maniac. 
As her ratings slide into the abyss, Kelly is grasping at straws, and going the “Jerry Springer” route to try and garner attention. 
Mike Pence appeared on her show Wednesday night, where Kelly attacked him for Trump’s CORRECT allegation that our North Korea-style media is rigged, they cherry pick polls, only using “negative ones” against Trump, and that MANY of these polls are HEAVILY oversampled (which they are). 
Watch the video: This is a movement – we are the political OUTSIDERS fighting against the FAILED GLOBAL ESTABLISHMENT! Join the resistance and help us fight to put America First! Amy Moreno is a Published Author , Pug Lover & Game of Thrones Nerd. You can follow her on Twitter here and Facebook here . Support the Trump Movement and help us fight Liberal Media Bias. Please LIKE and SHARE this story on Facebook or Twitter. '
